name: DarkTemTemForum
description:
English : 
Because i dont want to wait (if there are one somedays) i just make a little style that will transform the playtemtem forum light blind eye theme to a dark eyes-friendly theme.

Note: Only main function is actually in dark, i will update asap

French:
Car je ne veux pas attendre un thème sombre (si il y a en un un jour) j'ai fais un petit thème qui transformera le thème blanc qui détruit les yeux vers un thème sombre qui plaira à vos yeux :) !

Note : Pour le moment, seul les fonctions les plus utilisés sont noirs, attendez un peu que je fasse le reste :p
css: @-moz-document domain("playtemtem.com"){.p-pageWrapper{background:#272625}.p-breadcrumbs--container,.p-breadcrumbs.p-breadcrumbs--bottom{background:#444;color:#cec8c8}.block-container{color:#f9a356;background-color:#31302f}.block--messages .block-row,.block--messages .message{background:#444;color:#dadada}.block.block--category .block-header,.message-cell.message-cell--action,.message-cell.message-cell--user{background:#2a3743}.button.button--link,a.button.button--link{background:#2a3743;color:#7dcecc}.bbCodeBlock,.bbCodeBlock-title{background:#293643}.block-footer{color:#c4c4c4;background:#444}.menu-row.menu-row--alt{color:#fefefe;background:#444}.likesBar{background:#293643}.fr-toolbar{background:#2d2b2b}.fr-box.fr-basic .fr-wrapper{background:#444}.button.button--primary,a.button.button--primary{color:#dad9d9;background:#1c739c}.fr-box.fr-basic .fr-element{color:#e6e6e6;background:rgba(31,30,29,1)}.block-tabHeader{background:#2b3843;color:#b3b3b3}.pika-label,.pika-single{background:#272625}.pika-single{color:#f2f2f2}.is-outside-current-month{background:#8c8c8c}.formRow dt{background:#333}#editor_code_type optgroup{color:#666}.formRow .input{color:#86acd5}.codeEditor.CodeMirror.CodeMirror-focused{color:#f2f2f2}.tooltip--member .tooltip-content{color:#dadada;background:#4a4a4a;box-shadow:0 7px 15px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.55)}.memberTooltip-header{background:#292626}.memberTooltip-name{color:#d3d3d3}.inputNumber-button{border:0}.button.button--link:hover,a.button.button--link:hover{background:#222d38}.menu .input{background:#444;color:#dad9d9}.input{font-size:16px;color:#e6e6e6;background:rgba(23,21,21,.5)}.input.is-focused,.input:focus{outline:0;color:#e6e6e6;background:rgba(31,30,29,1)}.button.button--link:active,.button.button--link:focus,a.button.button--link:active,a.button.button--link:focus{background:#181f27}.bbCodeDemoBlock-item>dd,.overlay-content{background:#444}.actionBar-action,.actionBar-action--like{color:#49b5c6}.button.button--cta:hover,a.button.button--cta:hover{background:#bf4633}.data-tp-primary{color:red}a{color:#43a7b7}.p-breadcrumbs>li:last-child a{color:#0ee4e8}.p-breadcrumbs>li:last-child a :hover{color:#f445b0}.p-breadcrumbs>li a{color:#0dd9dc}.p-breadcrumbs>li a :hover{color:#f026c8}.tooltip--preview .tooltip-content{color:#dadada;background:#151413}.tooltip--preview .tooltip-content-inner .tooltip-content-cover{background:linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(68,68,68,.35) 160px,#0e0d0d 200px)}}@-moz-document regexp("https://www.playtemtem.com/forums/members/(.*)"){.memberHeader-main{background:#3e5062}.memberHeader-name{color:#fbeaea}.input.is-focused,.input:focus{color:#e6e6e6}.input::placeholder{color:#f2f2f2}.memberOverviewBlock-seeMore{background:#444}.blockMessage{color:#dadada;background:#171616}.contentRow-snippet{color:#f5821a}}@-moz-document regexp("https://www.playtemtem.com/forums/account/(.*)"){.formRow>dt{background:#444}.input{background:#454545}}@-moz-document url(https://www.playtemtem.com/forums/account/alerts){.block-row.block-row--alt{color:#f9a356;background:#444}}@-moz-document regexp("https://www.playtemtem.com/forums/whats-new/(.*)"){.tabs--standalone{color:#f6f9fd;background:#444}.message-responseRow{background:#293643}}@-moz-document regexp("https://www.playtemtem.com/forums/threads/(.*)"){.message-gradient{background:linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(68,68,68,0) 0,#0a0a0a 90%)}}
